name: Konnected
0:
”Alexa, is the front door open?”
”Alexa, turn off the siren.”
”Alexa, what's the temperature in the garage?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Connect and control wired alarm system sensors, sirens, strobes and relays with Alexa and the Konnected Alarm Panel. This skill requires a Konnected device registered with the Konnected Cloud using the free Konnected App. When adding this skill, you will link your Konnected Cloud account to Alexa. Then, all of your Konnected zones and devices will automatically be imported and synced to your Alexa account.
* Door and window sensors each show up as contact sensors in Alexa and update in real-time.
* Motion detectors show up as motion sensors in Alexa and update in real-time.
* Temperature sensors also sync to Alexa in real-time.
* Sirens, switches, and momentary switches will appear as switches in Alexa, and can be turned on/off by voice command, the Alexa app, or Alexa routines.
* Set up routines to trigger when a door, window or motion sensor is triggered. For example, have Alexa announce when a door opens.
